蒸し焼: (むしやき) - baking foods in a covered pan; foods baked in a covered pan
蒸し焼き: (むしやき) - baking foods in a covered pan; foods baked in a covered pan
蒸し物: (むしもの) - food cooked by steaming
蒸し菓子: (むしがし) - steamed confection (e.g. manju, uirou, steamed yokan); steamed cake
蒸し返す: (むしかえす) - to reheat/to steam over; to bring up again (a problem that has been dealt with)/to take up again/to drag up/to rehash
蒸し飯: (むしめし) - steamed rice (esp. cold rice reheated by steaming it); mochi rice with red beans steamed in a steaming basket/rice with red beans (eaten on celebratory occasions)
蒸す: (むす) - to steam (food, towel, etc.); to be hot and humid/to be sultry
蒸れる: (むれる) - to be stuffy; to moulder; to molder
蒸パン: (むしパン) - steamed bun; steamed bread
蒸民: (じょうみん) - the masses; the people
蒸気タービン: (じょうきタービン) - steam turbine
蒸気暖房: (じょうきだんぼう) - steam heating
蒸気機関車: (じょうききかんしゃ) - steam locomotive
蒸気浴: (じょうきよく) - vapor bath; vapour bath; steam bath
蒸気船: (じょうきせん) - steamship; steamboat; steamer
蒸気霧: (じょうきぎり) - steam fog; sea smoke
蒸汽船: (じょうきせん) - steamship; steamboat; steamer
蒸焼: (むしやき) - baking foods in a covered pan; foods baked in a covered pan
蒸焼き: (むしやき) - baking foods in a covered pan; foods baked in a covered pan
蒸物: (むしもの) - food cooked by steaming
蒸留水: (じょうりゅうすい) - distilled water
蒸留酒: (じょうりゅうしゅ) - distilled liquor; spirits
蒸発: (じょうはつ) - evaporation; disappearance (of people intentionally concealing their whereabouts)/unexplained disappearance
蒸着: (じょうちゃく) - deposition (e.g. vacuum deposition); vaporization/evaporation
蒸篭: (せいろう) - (井籠 (rarely 井篭) refers to a square basket) steaming basket/wooden frame holder with reed base used to steam food over a pot; soba served on a small wickerwork tray/wickerwork tray (for serving soba)
蒸籠: (せいろう) - (井籠 (rarely 井篭) refers to a square basket) steaming basket/wooden frame holder with reed base used to steam food over a pot; soba served on a small wickerwork tray/wickerwork tray (for serving soba)
蒸籠蒸し: (せいろむし) - steaming (of food) using a bamboo steamer
蒸菓子: (むしがし) - steamed confection (e.g. manju, uirou, steamed yokan); steamed cake
蒸返す: (むしかえす) - to reheat/to steam over; to bring up again (a problem that has been dealt with)/to take up again/to drag up/to rehash
蒸飯: (むしめし) - steamed rice (esp. cold rice reheated by steaming it); mochi rice with red beans steamed in a steaming basket/rice with red beans (eaten on celebratory occasions)
蒸餅: (じょうべい) - steamed mochi; manju; bread
蒼々: (あおあお) - (often 青々として) verdant; fresh and green; bright green; lush
蒼い: (あおい) - blue/green; (青い, 蒼い only) pale; (青い, 蒼い only) unripe/inexperienced
蒼ざめる: (あおざめる) - to become pale; to turn pale
蒼天: (そうてん) - blue sky; azure sky
蒼惶として: (そうこうとして) - in great haste
蒼梧: (そうご) - Chinese parasol-tree (Firmiana simplex); Chinese bottletree; Japanese varnishtree; phoenix-tree
蒼氓: (そうぼう) - the people; the public; citizens
蒼浪: (そうろう) - blue waves/blue wave; hair that has lost its shine due to ageing
蒼竜: (そうりゅう) - blue dragon; Azure Dragon (god said to rule over the eastern heavens); {astron}  seven mansions (Chinese constellations) of the eastern heavens; large horse with a bluish-leaden coat; shape of an old pine tree
蒼紅: (そうこう) - blue and red; azure and crimson
蒼茫: (そうぼう) - vast and blue (e.g. ocean); dusky/shadowy
蒼蒼: (あおあお) - (often 青々として) verdant; fresh and green; bright green; lush
蒼蝿: (あおばえ) - bluebottle fly; (せいよう, そうよう only)   little pest
蒼蠅: (そうよう) - bluebottle fly; (せいよう, そうよう only)   little pest
蒼褪める: (あおざめる) - to become pale; to turn pale
蒼黒い: (あおぐろい) - black with hints of blue (as in a bruise); bluish black
蒼龍: (そうりゅう) - blue dragon; Azure Dragon (god said to rule over the eastern heavens); {astron}  seven mansions (Chinese constellations) of the eastern heavens; large horse with a bluish-leaden coat; shape of an old pine tree
蓄える: (たくわえる) - to store/to lay in stock; to have a beard/to grow a beard
